name: TONAPI Explorer
description: TON blockchain data from TONAPI -- accounts, jettons, NFTs, prices, transactions, traces, DNS, staking

api_key.description: TONAPI Bearer token for higher rate limits (optional, public API works without it)

tools.name: tonapi_account
tools.description: Get TON account info by address or .ton domain

tools.name: tonapi_account_jettons
tools.description: List jetton balances for a TON wallet

tools.name: tonapi_account_nfts
tools.description: List NFTs owned by a TON account

tools.name: tonapi_account_events
tools.description: Get recent events/transactions for a TON account

tools.name: tonapi_account_search
tools.description: Search TON accounts by domain name

tools.name: tonapi_jetton_info
tools.description: Get jetton metadata and stats by master contract address

tools.name: tonapi_jetton_holders
tools.description: List top holders of a jetton

tools.name: tonapi_rates
tools.description: Get current exchange rates for TON tokens

tools.name: tonapi_rates_chart
tools.description: Get historical price chart data for a token

tools.name: tonapi_nft_collection
tools.description: Get NFT collection details by contract address

tools.name: tonapi_nft_items
tools.description: List NFT items in a collection

tools.name: tonapi_nft_item
tools.description: Get detailed info about a single NFT item

tools.name: tonapi_transaction
tools.description: Look up a TON transaction by hash

tools.name: tonapi_trace
tools.description: Get execution trace for a TON transaction

tools.name: tonapi_validators
tools.description: List current TON blockchain validators

tools.name: tonapi_dns_resolve
tools.description: Resolve a .ton domain to wallet/site address

tools.name: tonapi_dns_info
tools.description: Get domain info including owner and expiry

tools.name: tonapi_dns_auctions
tools.description: List active .ton domain auctions

tools.name: tonapi_staking_pools
tools.description: List available TON staking pools

tools.name: tonapi_staking_pool
tools.description: Get detailed info for a specific staking pool
